channel.title: Why is Safe Zone Erroring?

item.title: Why is Safe Zone Erroring?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Dell, post:2, topic:80198”]make sure the safe zone is a Square shape…[/quote]What’s that mean? It can’t be rectangular? Huh… All sides have to be equal or something? o.o[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 08:27:27 PM[/size][hr]Does it?

Read full topic

item.title: Why is Safe Zone Erroring?
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

make sure the safe zone is a Square shape…

Read full topic
